title: Ridesharing arrangement; defined
context: [ยง279G-1] Ridesharing arrangement; defined. As used in this chapter, &ldquo;ridesharing arrangement&rdquo; means the transportation of persons in a motor vehicle where that transportation is incidental to another purpose of the driver. The term includes ridesharing arrangements known as carpools, vanpools, and buspools. [L 1982, c 166, pt of ยง1]
